short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Get current car prices on certain sites

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
An extension to roughly calculate how much it will cost to import a car into a country.
Countries supported at the moment
- Malawi
Websites supported at the moment
- www.beforward.jp
More countries and websites to be available in the near future.
